name: Space Car Scramble
description:
Futuristic cars delivering owies to each other with devastating weapons. A top-down Twisted-Metal inspired cyberpunk showdown for your playing pleasure.

GameDev.TV Game Jam submission 2021. Created by Nic Basansky. Thanks for playing!

GitHub:

https://github.com/NicBasansky/SpaceCarScramble

Music from ZapSplat.com.

All assets are with the creative commons license.
